alterniumInfo.name: Dragonsword Largo
alterniumInfo.description: Special Skill activated regardless of cooldown do not consume stacks if below the maximum Passive Skill stack.

reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Clareth El Arcadia is a frontline damage dealer. He is notable for having high innate DEF PEN and a slowly stacking ATK% self-buff. This buff, while unimpressive on its own, allows Clareth to use his Special Skill independent of current cooldown progress at max stacks. Both normal and extra Special Skill casts consume the stacks, starting the process anew.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Clareth’s Alternium Reactor radically alters his kit by changing extra Special Skills casts to not consume ATK% stacks. This means that from the moment he acquires max stacks until he uses Special Skill normally, Clareth attacks only with his Special Skill, outputting absurdly high damage.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As the stacking process is painfully slow under most circumstances, there are only two consistent ways to enable this Alternium Reactor:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Deploying Clareth when his Special Skill is on cooldown","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Manually using Ultimate Skill right after Special Skill","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE, innate DEF PEN allows Clareth to easily reach the coveted 100% DEF PEN, making him one of the better cheap damage dealers in the game until other units can acquire similar DEF PEN values through Flame Relic gear and ship latents. Ultimately, melee range means he has survivability issues in high-end content, as his damage falls short of best damage dealers (e.g. Eve Meitner) and clunkiness inherent to his Alternium Reactor makes him both a complicated and unrewarding damage dealer option.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, it is possible to make a novel team focused on enabling his Alternium Reactor by cycling to his 2nd deploy. Unfortunately, this process is long and telegraphed, allowing knowledgeable opponents to set up before the crown prince returns. On top of that, if killed when his Special Skill cooldown is about to come up, Clareth loses the burst window his team relies on.\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Alternium Reactor gives Clareth potential to output amazing damage","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Clareth cannot be stopped from casting extra Special Skills by Skill Seal ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Setup required to enable this damage is impractical","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A Melee attacker whose attacks get stronger the more he damages enemies

introduction.introduction:
클라레스 엘 아르카데나는 높은 기본 능력치를 바탕으로 다수 전투에서 두각을 드러내는 스트라이커입니다.

용혈을 이은 아르카데나 제국의 황태자이자, 구원 기사단의 일원인 그는 문무를 겸비한 실력자였습니다. 일견 오만해 보일 수 있는 성격은, 쇠약한 황제를 대신해 정무를 돌보면서 고려할 필요 없는 부분임이 밝혀졌습니다. 백성들 역시 그의 통치 아래 제국이 어느 때보다 큰 번영을 이룰 것이라고 확신했습니다.
하지만 제국의 역사는, 클라레스에게 평화의 시대를 이룩하도록 허락하지 않았습니다.

pvp.notes: Benefits from Special Skill DMG AMP found on Challenger’s Hands and Flame Relics

baseDescription.baseDescription: Strikes enemies in front, inflicting AoE damage with his Dragonsword and magic.
Gains ATK +2% (Up to 40%) per enemy damaged with Basic Attack’s last hit (Cannot be canceled). Consumes all stacks after casting Special skill. Additionally gains 30% Ranged DMG RES.

level5.level5: DEF Penetration +60%. Starts with max passive stacks upon deployment.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Summons a greatsword that deals AoE DMG in front. When Passive Skill stack is at max, skill is cast regardless of cooldown.

level5.level5: Causes Hitstun to targets in Special Skill mode

baseDescription.baseDescription: Summons a weapon that deals AoE DMG in front. Allied Knights of Redemption members including Clareth becomes immune to all Hitstuns for 10s after casting skill.

level5.level5: Obtains max Passive Skill stack when cast
